about_the_game:
Everyone loves to eat, and succubus is no exception! Our succubus loves to eat and has an inhuman appetite! Help her cook before she eats you! 😈

The DLC contains adult content, that unlocks the entire content of the base game.
This free dlc adds more juicy poses for adults only.
Discover girl in a new way by completing the puzzles, and collect their in your collection!
Here you will open the entire gallery, play with one hand!

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

In the game, you have to make burgers according to recipes. Fry and combine the ingredients. (◕‿◕)♡

- Nudity or sexual content
- Not suitable for watching at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old
- Does not contain violence
- Does not contain drug abuse
- Does not involve self-harm or suicide
- There is alcohol in the game

FEATURES

  • 🍕 Well-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • 🍩 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🍗 One-handed mode
  • 🍙 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🍻 76 achievements
  • 🌶️ Relaxing music
  • 🍲 100+ recipes
  • 🍰 Puzzle game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
